data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nunes, Rudy Camilo, Bellini, Bruno Cavalcante (2019): A new species of Nothobrya Arlé, 1961 (Collembola: Entomobryidae) from Brazil and notes on key characters for Nothobryinae taxonomy, with an identification key to the species of the subfamily. Zootaxa 4615 (2): 375-391, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4615.2.9|1 occurrence
